name: ITSwitch
0:
”Alexa, turn on my living room”
”Alexa, turn off the bedroom”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: First log in to your account in the itPro App and sync your device, then bind your account in the IT Switch skill, and you can control the device by voice with Alexa
